Text.Page: Make no mistake, <PCCLASS:lcase>, the Tainted Gorge is where the federation's efforts will succeed or fail. A look in any direction from this fire is all the proof necessary for those who doubt.
This moment. Here, now. This is a time that shapes and defines the brave. Karascha must die!<TEXTBUTTON>To Karascha</TEXTBUTTON><EVENTPAGEBUTTON>Teleport to Karascha</EVENTPAGEBUTTON>
